TITLE_MAX60CHAR: Spatial Transcriptomics FAIR Data Management workshop
Workshop: Multitask perturbation modeling for single-cell omics

DESCRIPTION_MAX20WORDS: Best practices and quality assessment of spatial transcriptomics data
The aim is to establish best practices in managing research data and pinpoint key areas where the community requires improvements to enhance data FAIRness.

The 2023 HCA General Meeting will continue progress towards building the first draft of the Human Cell Atlas, including connecting and leveraging diverse communities, reference maps, data assembly and computational efforts.
